Show method for compData object

Source: R/show-methods.R
show-compData-method.Rd

Show method for compData object.

# S4 method for compData
show(object)

Arguments

object

A compData object

Author

Charlotte Soneson

Examples

mydata <- generateSyntheticData(dataset = "mydata", n.vars = 12500, 
                                samples.per.cond = 5, n.diffexp = 1250)
mydata
